hooks: 💡 After {X} years as a {role} in {industry}, here's what I've learned about {topic}
🎯 3 mistakes 90% of {audience} make in {domain} (and how to avoid them)
📈 Why {trend} will completely transform {industry} in 2024
🔍 The data doesn't lie: here's the reality about {topic} in {industry}

Surprising statistic + Personal analysis + Concrete solutions + Action CTA
Contrarian opinion + Solid arguments + Business implications + Discussion

Tag a colleague dealing with this challenge.
